author: Maya Dangerfield
title: Turning cow poop into energy - Video - Technology
text:
Turning cow poop into energy by Maya Dangerfield @CNNTech Alliance Diaries in Trenton Florida uses an anaerobic methane digester to convert cow manure into enough energy to power the farm. Related Videos India freaks out over U.S. plans to change H-1B high-skilled visas
